title: Provenance Tag Schema
description: Standard context engine provenance tag schema for all data sources (Blueprint 11.1)

source_id.description: Unique identifier for the source document or data record.

source_type.description: The category type of the source.

authority_tier.description: Authority tier from 1 (System of Record - Highest) to 5 (General Web - Lowest).

version.description: Version string of the source document or API format.

effective_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the source becomes effective.

expiry_date.description: ISO 8601 date when the source expires.

owner.description: Owner or custodian of the source data or document.

fetched_at.description: ISO 8601 datetime when the data was fetched or retrieved.

ttl_seconds.description: Time-to-live in seconds before the data must be refetched.

trust_class.description: Whether the source is explicitly verified as trusted.

data_classification.description: The sensitivity level of the data.

jurisdiction.description: Geographical or structural jurisdiction of the data (e.g., 'SG', 'GLOBAL').

doc_section.description: Specific clause or section identifier within the document.

chunk_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the specific chunk or context section.
